name: Santa Breaks Loose
description:
Don't forget to play in fullscreen mode !

The vultures have taken control of the city, on christmas day. But Santa can't stand it. He decides to fight the vultures, and take the challenge by completing his annual mission.

--

This game was made for the Yogscast game jam, december 2019. Unfortunatly, we were 10 minutes too late - yes, we're always late. Life is too great to be in a rush.

Enjoy :)

Team Les Macaques en Rut.
